## KeyOfValue type

获取值类型为指定类型的所有 key

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type KeyOfValue<Target, Value> = {
    [K in keyof Target]: Target[K] extends Value ? K : never;
}[keyof Target];
```
